posts.post_content: Hi folks...really want to add a nice Chase Trophy to my Prince Hal collection...I'm looking for something in the 3-4 range with nice centering and little to no creasing.  Anyone have what I'm looking for?  SGC preferred but PSA ok, too...and thanks!

hey Matt.. an ebay auction for a psa 3 just came up.. check that out man

Jamie

[quote name="Blunder19" post=907400]hey Matt.. an ebay auction for a psa 3 just came up.. check that out man

Jamie[/QUOTE]

Thanks, Jamie...
Bump...still lookin' as I didn't win the one on eBay tonight...

Hi Matt,

E-mail sent re this SGC 40 that I have for sale.  $75 includes shipping and paypal fees.

Hope that helps,
--S
